document_data.caption: Akbar bin Husam, a surprisingly muscular sorcerer.
document_data.name: Akbar bin Husam
document_data.mainbody: '''Akbar bin Husam''' was a [[Zakharan (ethnicity)|Zakharan]] [[Sorcerer (kit)|sorcerer]] visiting [[Hiyal]] in [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|254|[[Akbar bin Husam]]}}
document_data.Relationships: Akbar's uncle, a wealthy merchant named [[Farid]], was involved in a dispute with an [[Al-Badia]] named [[Jamal al-Karim]] that resulted in Jamal's death. Akbar traveled to Hiyal to support his uncle during the looming blood feud with Jamal's tribe.
document_data.Possessions: Aside from his spellbook, Akbar owned a ''[[ring of protection|ring of protection +2]]''.
